ygData.subject: Re: weapon's for necro's
ygData.msgSnippet: i just bought the dagger of marnek =)  hehe, im so happy about it.  as a main weapon im still using a giant snake fang tho, since the dagger is mainly good for
ygData.messageBody:
i just bought the dagger of marnek =) hehe, im so happy about it. as a
main weapon im still using a giant snake fang tho, since the dagger is
mainly good for the bonuses (and, of course, if i need a magic weapon). the
great thing about it is i can keep it in a thrown slot. im pretty sure i
got a really great deal on it too (25pp)
has anyone run across a crook stinger? i spent a week (real time) in lesser
faydark looking for a damn named wasp, but didnt find him. in fact, a few
druids/rangers said they have been looking for it since after beta, and
still havent seen it. perhaps it's gone?

belphenor
